cast_spell.title: cast_spell
cast_spell.description: Casts the specified spell by its ID. The spell has to be in the mob's ability list.

toggle_stance.title: toggle_stance
toggle_stance.description: Toggles the stance for the specified spell if applicable.

spell.title: spell
spell.description: The spell to toggle the stance for.

toggled.title: toggled
toggled.description: True if the stance should be toggled on, false if it should be toggled off.

wait.title: wait
wait.description: Causes the pattern script to wait before proceeding to the next action. This is in SECONDS and can be a decimal.
